specification.name: JSON Run Cards
specification.title: JSON Run Cards: Process Invocation and Summary Envelopes
specification.description: Defines standard JSON envelopes for invoking programs (called 'job cards') and for returning standardized execution summaries (called 'report cards').

STANDARD.description: Standard invocation metadata understood by JSON Run Card infrastructure and programs. All fields are optional.

report-card-file.description: Filesystem path where the invoked program should write its report card.

timestamp-utc.description: UTC timestamp when the invocation request was created. May include decimal fractions. Example: "1737848123.527"

request-id.description: Caller-generated identifier for correlating this invocation with summaries and logs.

STANDARD.extension_policy: Additional STANDARD fields may be added in future versions. Programs must ignore unknown keys.

ARGS.description: Program-specific arguments. Structure is entirely defined by the invoked program.
ARGS.extension_policy: Run Card infrastructure must not interpret ARGS contents.

STANDARD.description: Standard execution metadata and optional observability data. STANDARD must exist, but all contained fields are optional.

complete.description: True if the program completed its intended task. False if it failed or was aborted.

status.description: Optional textual status indicator such as "ok", "generic-error", "partial-completion", or program-defined states.

timestamp-utc.description: UTC timestamp when the report card was written. May include decimal fractions.

request-id.description: Echo of the request_id from the invocation envelope, if provided.

invocation.description: Optional full copy of the invocation JSON envelope that initiated this execution.

events.description: Optional ordered list of human-readable execution notes. Narrative, not machine-parseable.

complex-events.description: Optional ordered list of structured execution events for machine processing and advanced observability.

timestamp_utc.description: UTC timestamp when this event occurred. May include decimal fractions.

kind.description: Short type string identifying the class of event (e.g., "file.copy", "task.start").

tags.description: Optional list of tag strings for filtering and grouping.

data.description: Optional structured data payload associated with the event.

STANDARD.extension_policy: Additional STANDARD fields may be added in future versions. Readers must ignore unknown keys.

CUSTOM.description: Program-specific result data. Structure is entirely defined by the invoked program.
CUSTOM.extension_policy: Run Card infrastructure must not interpret CUSTOM contents.

invocation: Caller must write a JSON file matching invocation_envelope and provide its path to the program.
Program must treat invocation_envelope as read-only.
If STANDARD.report-card-file is provided, program should write its report card to that location.
report-card: Program should write exactly one report card JSON if possible.
Program may include any or none of the STANDARD optional fields.
Program-specific results must be placed under CUSTOM.
Programs and infrastructure must ignore unknown fields to preserve forward compatibility.
